Title: The Dark Mirror.
Subtitle: Book One of the Bridei Chronicles.
Authors: Juliet Marillier.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=8TvHYU-81KEC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Fostered by one of the land's most powerful druids, young nobleman Bridei undertakes a series of mysterious tasks designed to teach him about the world and his destiny, but when he discovers a child seemingly abandoned by the fairie folk, he meets resistance in his determination to save her. Reprint. 15,000 first printing..
